title: freecoat nails | Non-Toxic Beauty Bar
author: Lazarus
description: freecoat nails is the nation's first non-toxic beauty bar franchise system. freecoat is proud to be your local go-to beauty and nail bar.
cleaned_text: We're keepin 'em coated the freecoat way with our non-toxic polish line, featuring 15 beautiful shades, two fresh top coats and cuticle oil. Our polishes are completely non-toxic, vegan, cruelty-free and gluten-free. All polishes are available for services in-studio and will be featured in our retail boutiques so you can take home your
